      • getBufferLength

        public int getBufferLength()

      • find

        public boolean find()
        find a whole uploading data chunk in the current buffer. the start and end variable indicates the chunk start position and end position.
        Returns:
        boolean if found

      • findSub

        public boolean findSub()
        find the sub-boundary from the position behind current content header
        Returns:
        true if found the sub-boundary

      • getBoundEnd

        public int getBoundEnd()
        the end of the data chunk for a uploading file, also, it's the start of next boundary in the current buffer.
        Returns:

      • readContentHeader

        public int readContentHeader()
        from the boundStart position of buffer, read each line of content header, put header section into a map if found a whole content header successfully. meanwhile, the function return the end contentStart position of current boundary within current buffer.
        Returns:
        position at the buffer if read a whole content header successfully, else return -1;
